author: By JULHAS ALAM Associated Press
title: Bangladesh's leader urges all citizens to stay at home
description: DHAKA, Bangladesh (AP) — Bangladesh Prime Minister Sheikh Hasina appealed on Wednesday to all citizens to stay at home and avoid any gatherings to slow the transmission of the coronavirus.
content:
DHAKA, Bangladesh (AP) Bangladesh Prime Minister Sheikh Hasina appealed on Wednesday to all citizens to stay at home and avoid any gatherings to slow the transmission of the coronavirus.
In particular, she urged hundreds of thousands of Bangladeshis who work… [+1894 chars]
